net.tridentsdk.packets.play.in

Class PacketPlayInPlayerClickWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.netty.packet.InPacket
      • net.tridentsdk.packets.play.in.PacketPlayInPlayerClickWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet

    public class PacketPlayInPlayerClickWindow
extends InPacket
    Packet sent by the player when it clicks on a slot in a window.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
